message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I think this offer benefits us both.
Let's try to find a middle ground, Alice. I think this split is more reasonable considering the time-sensitive nature of our negotiation.
Bob, time is money. This offer ensures you still get a decent share, even with the declining value.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to negotiate, but I still believe we can find a better split than the previous offers.
Bob, the value keeps decreasing for you. This is a good deal considering the circumstances. Don't let this opportunity slip away.
